text: What are some sites you love <@UD53A9UUR>?
hey <@UGWB0PCCV>, I have since worked around this and removed all duplicate stylesheet references. Is this something you still can’t replicate. If so I have some time later today to do so and DM you.

i dig sitepoint
Quick question, everytime i try to enroll a test contact in order to test a workflow, i keep getting an error about suppression settings yet the contacts aren't suppressed. Any ideas?
Most commonly, this is about re-enrollment criteria being off by default.  Is this about enrolling a contact again by chance?
correct, we have a few test contacts that are already in there that we cant send to then I just created myself as a contact and I am unable to send to it (but i found that one out as to why)
if you enable re-enrollment in your workflow, does that solve the issue?  If not, can you DM a link to the workflow so I can see what might be gong on?
Is there a param/way to set Vidyard integration embeds to autoplay?
Not yet. I was told it’s a planned feature though and someone once said vidyard themselves supported it, it’s just a matter of getting the HubL support figured out
thanks dude!
if your client has a vidyard subscription directly you might be able to get the JS embed code and do it that way
Hi John, that would be fantastic thank you. Essentially want to know exactly when/how this occurs

General question, for ” export_to_template_context=True”, is there an option for a File field, to pick from File Manager? I went here but I do not see that option: <https://designers.HubSpot.com/docs/hubl/export-to-template-context>

<@U26BLKGE4> vote on it here
<https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/HubSpot-Ideas/Add-Loop-Autoplay-Mute-options-to-Video-Player/idi-p/266121>
Yes sir!

also, i really enjoy smashing magazine's newsletter.  Would love to receive a HubSpot developer (specific) digest in my inbox which would include new features, interesting solves in the forums and interesting usage examples
Hey, all. I'm looking for examples of websites built on HubSpot that use the Shopify integration. Does anyone have some they'd like to share?
Or any ecommerce integration for that matter.
<@UBRG1R3EW> probably has some decent examples.
<@UB690RZA7> we have a bunch of clients shown on our web site <https://www.unific.com/> that use our integration from shopping carts to HubSpot
Thanks, <@UBRG1R3EW>. I'll DM you!
if partners are granted access to a HubSpot portal, does this fill in a "seat" for their portal?
I didnt think there was a limit to the amount of users you can add to your portal
only for the sales and service stuff correct?
The only “seat” functionality is Sales or Services seats. Website users don’t count against any kind of limit
thought so, Thanks Zack! (crazy customers not reading things)
Hey everyone, I need your help, Someone knows what link should I send here, I thought that it was the preview but I'm not sure
the design manager template link
HubSpot employees can access files in the design manager if you give them the link you see in your address bar
The preview link should be okay then, right?
no
will start with app
give them the link to the template itself

they can get to the preview from the template itself.

it makes it harder for them to get at the file to look through the code and what not if you just give them the preview
I'm not sure. But there is a File field for custom modules.
ok but if they asked for a complete folder with everything in it? that's different, right?
they are specifically asking for a link to the template itself. the assets that are linked to that template they can see.
they asked you to have that folder for organizations sake so they know where all of your files are for the practicum, makes it easier for them to look through them than if they were scattered
oh ok. Thank you very much for your help
no problem Vlad

Is there a spot in the forms upload where you can view all the uploads? I thought they were stored in file manager somewhere but I think there is another location. <@UBFA10FMF> I think it was a convo I had with you (cant remember)
Another question, is there a reason why Checkboxes can't be used to trigger re-enrollment in a workflow?
Has anyone found a HACK for allowing for SMART CONTENT in custom modules when using Rich Text??
you can custom build properties. using `{{request}}` variables
